entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Allow opening (raw) compressed archive entries in ZipArchiveEntry #63155
  • TcpClient.GetStream() sample code is incorrect and confusing #63154
  • Suspicious fragments found by PVS-Studio Static Analyzer #63149
  • Incorrect nullable annotation for ValidationAttribute.IsValid overload #63147
  • Infinite update of the settings file when opened from WSL2 #63145
  • Generated exe files don't work on arm64 #63144
  • Test failure Loader\\AssemblyDependencyResolver\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests.cmd #63143

Closed

  • CryptoStream.Read() read less bytes in .NET6 than in .NET5 #63151
  • RuntimeInformation.ProcessArchitecture is not a JIT constant #57152
    Future
  • Update Novell headers in System.Drawing.Common #63146
  • [API Proposal]: Change behaviour of Setting SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize (Or add documentation) #57859
    Future
  • Logging - inject custom fields into console logger (json) via DI #63068
    Future
  • [Android][x86][arm] System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.AllocateArrayTooLarge throws OverflowException instead of OutOfMemoryException #63079
    7.0.0
  • how to collect all assembly references. #63093

PullRequests

Created

  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Missing test files #63148
    area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Fixup some formatting in shared code #63156
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Move System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation to CoreLib #63140
    area-System.Runtime
  • NativeAOT: Do not run Vector version of Hardware Intrinsics when AVX2… #62951
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix a regression caused by 9ddd58a58d14a7bec5ed6eb777c6703c48a… #63084
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1527799 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
